/* CSS for Better Click to Tweet style */
.tm-tweet-clear {
  zoom: 1;
}
.tm-tweet-clear:after {
  display: block;
  visibility: hidden;
  height: 0;
  clear: both;
  content: ".";
}
.tm-click-to-tweet {
  display: block;
  background-color: #fff;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
  border: 1px solid #dddddd;
  -moz-border-radius: 4px;
  border-radius: 4px;
  padding: 15px 30px;
  margin: 15px 0px;
  zoom: 1;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .clearfix {
  zoom: 1;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .clearfix:after {
  display: block;
  visibility: hidden;
  height: 0;
  clear: both;
  content: ".";
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .clear {
  clear: both;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .f-left {
  float: left;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .f-right {
  float: right;
  display: inline-block;
  position: relative;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .list-reset {
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .list-reset li {
  list-style: none;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .list-float {
  zoom: 1;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .list-float:after {
  display: block;
  visibility: hidden;
  height: 0;
  clear: both;
  content: ".";
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .list-float li {
  float: left;
  display: inline-block;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .kill-box-shadow {
  box-shadow: none;
  -webkit-box-shadow: none;
  -moz-box-shadow: none;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .alignright {
  float: right;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  margin-left: 10px;
  text-align: right;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .alignleft {
  float: left;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  margin-right: 10px;
  text-align: right;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet:after {
  content: ".";
  display: block;
  clear: both;
  visibility: hidden;
  line-height: 0;
  height: 0;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .tm-ctt-reset {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet:after {
  display: block;
  visibility: hidden;
  height: 0;
  clear: both;
  content: ".";
}
.tm-click-to-tweet a {
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: none;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .tm-ctt-text {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  word-wrap: break-word;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .tm-ctt-text a {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  position: relative;
  color: #13afdf;
  font-size: 24px;
  line-height: 140%;
  text-transform: none;
  letter-spacing: 0.05em;
  font-weight: 100;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-transform: none;
}
.tm-click-to-tweet .tm-ctt-text a:hover {

</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-1242 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-forms ee_saas_feature_category-registration ee_saas_feature_category-upgrade entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Advanced Registration Forms"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/advanced-registration-forms/" title="Advanced Registration Forms"><i class="dashicons dashicons-list-view"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/advanced-registration-forms/">Ask custom questions for in your online event registration forms</a></h2>
</header><div class="entry-content"><p>Easily collect all the data and information you need with a custom event registration form for each event.</p>
</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-1245 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-payments entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Manage Payments"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/manage-payments/" title="Manage Payments"><i class="dashicons dashicons-cart"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/manage-payments/">Offer multiple payment options like credit cards, PayPal, invoices and offline payments</a></h2>
</header><div class="entry-content"><p>We don’t add any commission or ticketing fees. Subscribe to a online payment feature upgrade with Stripe, PayPal or another supported payment service and receive payments securely as your attendees register.</p>
</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-3776 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-tickets ee_saas_feature_category-upgrade entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Email custom event tickets with QR codes and barcodes to validate tickets, check-in your attendees and track attendance"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/barcode-qr-code-ticket-scanning/" title="Email custom event tickets with QR codes and barcodes to validate tickets, check-in your attendees and track attendance"><i class="dashicons dashicons-tickets-alt"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/barcode-qr-code-ticket-scanning/">Scan QR Code Tickets to Validate Tickets or Track Attendance</a></h2>
</header><div class="entry-content"><p>All your event ticketing needs are covered here at Event Smart! You can give attendees electronic tickets and then use our mobile apps to validate tickets or track attendance.</p>
</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-63114 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-check-in ee_saas_feature_category-scanning ee_saas_feature_category-tickets entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Event Apps"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/free-check-in-apps/" title="Event Apps"><i class="dashicons dashicons-smartphone"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/free-check-in-apps/">Free check in apps for validating tickets and recording guest check-ins and check-outs</a></h2>
</header><div class="entry-content"><p>Scan QR or bar codes to validate tickets at the door and track attendance; check-in or check-out attendees with the push of a button.</p>
</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-1166 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-branding ee_saas_feature_category-free-2 entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Personalize Your Appearance"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/custom-design/" title="Personalize Your Appearance"><i class="dashicons dashicons-admin-customizer"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/custom-design/">Customize your event website by choosing a theme</a></h2>
</header><div class="entry-content"><p>Pick a theme and then make it memorable with your brand and personality.</p>
</div><footer class="entry-footer"></footer></article><article class="post-1219 ee_saas_feature type-ee_saas_feature status-publish ee_saas_feature_category-free-2 ee_saas_feature_category-marketing ee_saas_feature_category-publishing entry has-post-thumbnail" aria-label="Commenting on Events"><header class="entry-header"><div class="ee-saas-image-top-center ee-saas-content-size-75"><a href="https://eventsmart.com/features/commenting-on-events/" title="Commenting on Events"><i class="dashicons dashicons-format-chat"></i></a></div><h2 class="entry-title"><a class="entry-title-link" rel="bookmark" href="https://eventsmart.com/features/commenting-on-events/">Commenting on Events</a></h2>

<section id="custom_html-2" class="widget_text widget widget_custom_html"><div class="widget_text widget-wrap"><div class="textwidget custom-html-widget"><div class="featured-sites">
<h3 class="title">Plan Many Types of Events Online</h3>
<p style="padding-bottom:40px;">Event Smart can help you accept online registrations and sell tickets for different kinds of events. Classes, conferences, workshops, trainings, seminars, socials, performances, and more!</p>

<div class="featured-site">
<a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/classes/"><img src="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134238/event-registrations-for-classes-and-workshops-300x200.jpg" alt="Events registration website for classes and workshops" width="300" height="200" class="alignright size-medium wp-image-64182" srcset="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134238/event-registrations-for-classes-and-workshops-300x200.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a>
<div> 
<h3>Classes & Workshops</h3>
<p>Save time by accepting online registrations through a class & workshop registration website. Set up your dates and times for your classes so your students can register and pay you online. Then create an attendee registration report in just a few clicks to see who is attending your next class.</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/classes/">Receive class & workshop registrations online</a></strong></p>
</div>
</div>
 
 

<div class="featured-site">
<a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/conferences/"><img src="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134254/event-registrations-for-conferences-300x225.jpg" alt="Events registration website for conferences" width="300" height="225" class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-64183" srcset="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134254/event-registrations-for-conferences-300x225.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a>
<div>
<h3>Conferences</h3>
<p>Sell tickets and online registrations to your next conference, convention, or symposium. Create different registration options with their own pricing and limits. Then collect custom registration details from each attendee along with online payments through debit and credit cards.</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/conferences/">Create your conference registration and ticketing website</a></strong></p>
</div>
</div>
 
 

<div class="featured-site">
<a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/festivals/"><img src="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134302/event-registrations-for-festivals-300x225.jpg" alt="Events registration website for festivals" width="300" height="225" class="alignright size-medium wp-image-64184" srcset="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134302/event-registrations-for-festivals-300x225.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a>
<div>
<h3>Festivals</h3>
<p>Sell tickets for your upcoming festival with a festival ticketing website from Event Smart. Offer various kinds of tickets and automatically send attendees tickets through email so you can scan them for a fast check-in into your festival.</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/festivals/">Sell tickets online for your upcoming festival</a></strong></p>
</div>
</div>
 
 

<div class="featured-site">
<a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/fundraisers/"><img src="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134332/event-registrations-for-nonprofits-fundraisers-300x200.jpg" alt="Events registration website for nonprofits and fundraisers" width="300" height="200" class="alignleft size-medium wp-image-64187" srcset="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134332/event-registrations-for-nonprofits-fundraisers-300x200.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a>
<div>
<h3>Nonprofits & Fundraisers</h3>
<p>Set up an event website so you can raise funds through a benefit or fundraiser like a gala dinner, golf tournament, walkathon, raffle, and more. Reach your fundraising goals faster by offering donation options alongside registrations or tickets for your next event.</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/fundraisers/">Accept online registrations or sell tickets for your next charity event</a></strong></p>
</div>
</div>
 
 

<div class="featured-site">
<a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/reunions/"><img src="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134404/event-registrations-for-reunions-300x200.jpg" alt="Events registration website for reunions" width="300" height="200" class="alignright size-medium wp-image-64189" srcset="https://d12m9erqbesehq.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/30134404/event-registrations-for-reunions-300x200.jpg" sizes="(max-width: 300px) 100vw, 300px"></a>
<div>
<h3>Reunions</h3>
<p>Sell tickets for your upcoming high school or family reunion without having to be a computer expert. Set up your tickets, connect your account with a payment service, and start receiving online registrations today!</p>
<p><strong><a href="https://eventsmart.com/plan-events/reunions/">Create your reunion registration website</a></strong></p>
</div>
</div>

</div></div></div></section>
